original_text: So the old prophet picked up the body of God's servant. He put it on the donkey. He brought it back to Bethel. He showed that he was very sad that the man had died and then he buried him.
korean_text: 늙은 선지자가 하나님의 사람의 시체를 들어 나귀에 실어 가지고 돌아와 자기 성읍으로 들어가서 슬피 울며 장사하되

sentences.original_text: So the old prophet picked up the body of God's servant.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 늙은 선지자는 하나님의 종의 시신을 들어 올렸습니다.

sentences.original_text: He put it on the donkey.
He brought it back to Bethel.
He showed that he was very sad
